divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to work around 530 am coming from the downtown of kc. I notice a orange light in the distance near the paso bridge. I thought nothing of it but Its a helicopter. The closer I got I noticed it wasnt leaving the area it flew over the amusement park worlds of fun. So I saod to my self it wasnt a helicopter but maybe a plane in the wrong flight pattern. I had others in my vehical that saw the same thing. No one said anything until we got within a mile ththats when we all spoke. It appeared to be like a almond on fire not sure of the speed but it was but it was large coming east to west slow pace no flashing lights but a brightly cover tail
trends: There has been one other sighting in North Kansas City
There were no other sightings in North Kansas City on or around November 3rd 2012
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
